name: lofi bonsai
description:
You have acquired a bonsai. Tend to it to the rhythm of the passing days. Maybe you'll find inner peace and all that jazz. 

Created over three days for the second AIE Alphabet Jam, with a theme of Growth.

Producer - Xan Farley
Artists - Tristen T, Jennamarie Hunter, & Soreiany Khong
Programmers - Josh Livingston & Alexis Serna
Music - Jorden Dobson

SFX from Freesound users neolein, SpliceSound, and Kreastricon.
